info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:47PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. Winds gusting over 35 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 145 PM EST, a band of moderate to heavy snow was near Clayton, moving east at 40 MPH. This band of heavy snow will continue to move southeast across the northern portion of Jefferson County. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Fort Drum, Clayton, Wellesley Island, Redwood, Philadelphia, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Antwerp, Evans Mills, Millen Bay, Grindstone, La Fargeville, Oxbow, and Depauville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 49 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
